name: Dratis
description:
A recently dug out 2016 prototype for my game that dates back to 2008 (it was known as Sketchris back then).

Draw blocks and clear lines as new randomly filled lines appear from the bottom.

You can play it with the keyboard (cursors + space to "draw"), or mouse (click to "draw" blocks).

It's just a simple demo, but I hope you will enjoy it!
